name: No Humans (Simon Chatelus)
description:
No Humans is a game created in 48 hours during the Game Dev Party 14 where you must kill as many  humans as possible to save the planet.
Use the left button of your mouse to create accidents and chain reactions destroying the city!

Do the best score before the timer ends.
